writer.name: W·彼得·伊利夫 W. Peter Iliff

introduction: In “Ocean on Fire,” Jack, a former commando, sets out to find his father, an idealistic, independent observer on large fishing trawlers who disappears during a voyage. The crew reports it as an accident, but Jack doesn’t buy it and instead begins his own investigation.With the help of a journalist, he uncovers a web of corruption that entangles politicians, lobbyists, drug cartels and mafia bosses around the world that exploit maritime routes for slavery, arms and drug trafficking.
